thread.title: Van Gaal CSKA Moscow match interview (video)
thread.title_full: Van Gaal CSKA Moscow match interview (video)

author: paulmbanks
title: Van Gaal CSKA Moscow match interview (video)
text:
Tweet 
Here it is below, embedded from YouTube, Manchester United boss Louis van Gaal giving his pre-match interview vs CSKA Moscow. United would draw with the Russian side 1-1, getting an equalizer from Anthony Martial (here is the link to footage of that scoring strike) 
Van Gaal covered a whole host of topics in the interview above including: a rare start for Jesse Lingard, the importance of their fatigue coach and what impact, if any, the upcoming Manchester Derby had on this match. He also discusses what kind of side CSKA Moscow is, and what their strengths and weaknesses are. 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous television and radio talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
